column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went to CBBR for my cousin's Birthday...we had reservations for 8pm
column2: of course they didn't seat us for 20+ minutes after because they were "setting the table"--okay
column3: I get this...but when we finally arrived to our table
column4: only half of the place settings had been set.  So
column5: the waiter sort of "chuckled" and asked us to either wait in a corridor or go all the way back to the front of the restaurant.  If it is going to take you 20+ minutes to set a table
column6: the table should be set and the host should at least be somewhat apologetic about the situation.
